title: Something is wrong with queues
body:
Hey, so lately I've been trying to find a game (normal and ranked) and it just constantly keeps finding matches, I accept but every single time it doesnt go to champ select. like someone dodges always. and when it does go to champ select some one just doesnt pick and it returns to the queue.

it finds a match constantly, like every 1 second it finds a match..
can someone help me understand the problem?

EDIT: when I try to find a game with 4 premades it works perfectly fine.

replies.body: EUNE has been having some issues over the day, but our network team is hard at work.  Keep an eye on our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for any changes, though everything might be okay now.
We have the same with friend
